cast.overview: A dangerous combination of radiation and insecticide causes the unfortunate Scott Carey to shrink, slowly but surely, until he is only a few inches tall. His home becomes a wilderness where he must survive everything from spiders living in the cellar to his beloved cat.
cast.title: The Incredible Shrinking Man

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Grant Williams (August 18, 1931 - July 25, 1985) was an American film actor and operatic tenor. He is best remembered for his portrayal of Scott Carey in the seminal science fiction film The Incredible Shrinking Man (1957). The film has become a cult classic.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Grant Williams, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Grant Williams
